ai-thag8.1:1.1_0: Don’t get involved in lots of work,
ai-thag8.1:1.2_0: avoid people, and don’t try to acquire things.
ai-thag8.1:1.3_0: If you’re eager and greedy for flavors,
ai-thag8.1:1.4_0: you’ll miss the goal that brings such happiness.
ai-thag8.1:2.1_0: They know it really is a bog,
ai-thag8.1:2.3_0: Honor is a subtle dart, hard to extract,
ai-thag8.1:2.4_0: and hard for a sinner to give up.”
ai-thag8.1:3.1_0: The deeds of a mortal aren’t bad
ai-thag8.1:3.3_0: You yourself should not do bad,
ai-thag8.1:3.4_0: for mortals have deeds as their kin.
ai-thag8.1:4.1_0: You’re not a bandit because of what someone says,
ai-thag8.1:4.2_0: you’re not a sage because of what someone says;
ai-thag8.1:4.4_0: so the gods will know you.
ai-thag8.1:5.2_0: that here we need to be restrained.
ai-thag8.1:5.3_0: But those who do understand this,
ai-thag8.1:6.4_0: even a rich person doesn’t really live.
ai-thag8.1:7.1_0: All is heard with the ear,
ai-thag8.1:7.2_0: all is seen with the eye;
ai-thag8.1:8.1_0: Though you have eyes, be as if blind;
ai-thag8.1:8.2_0: though you have ears, be as if deaf;
ai-thag8.1:8.3_0: though you have wisdom, be as if stupid;
ai-thag8.1:8.4_0: though you have strength, be as if feeble.
ai-thag8.1:8.6_0: lie as still as a corpse.
